name: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会会址纪念馆
name_en: Memorial for the Site of the First National Congress of the Communist Party of China
description: 中国共产党的诞生地，一幢典型的石库门建筑，见证了中国历史上开天辟地的大事变。
description_en: The birthplace of the Communist Party of China, a typical Shikumen building that witnessed a world-changing event in Chinese history.
